name: Attack of the Yellow Things
description:
LD50 entry.

Try to surfive for as long as possible.

How to play:

  1. Move - Click on free cube
  2. Attack - Click on enemy in range
  3. Use ablility - Right mouse button

Ship Types:

  1. Light - Has 2 actions per turn. Can permanently buff attack of allies in range
  2. Heavy - Does a lot of damage
  3. Artillery - Does even more damage from farther away
  4. Foundry - Can create light ships
  5. Support - Can heal ships in range
